post:
I have a pair of domains that I'm not doing anything with.  Actually got them from someone else a few years ago.  They're about ready to expire, registered with GoDaddy and I'm not going to use them.

They're free for the taking.  I make this offer with the assumption that I can transfer them to another GoDaddy client.  If I can't, I'm just going to let them expire.

STUDENT-LOAN-FAQ.INFO   That expires on Jan 20th.

CAR-REMOTE-STARTERS.COM That expires on Feb 5th.
